mapper.select: select class1_ as className from gms_goods where corp_no_ = #{corpNo} and class1_ <> '原材料类' group by class1_
select class2_ as className from gms_goods where corp_no_ = #{corpNo} and class1_ = #{className} and class2_ <> '' and class2_ is not null group by class2_
select brand_ as name from gms_goods where corp_no_ = #{corpNo} and brand_ <> '' and brand_ is not null group by brand_
